name: Prodigal Roots: War Table Mission
description:
Written in the world of Bioware’s Dragon Age: Inquisition, this original mission showcases the iconic branching paths of the three Inquisition advisors and their agents. New characters and locations are introduced through mission reports, culminating in a new open-world area for the player to explore.

Prodigal Roots is a Twine-based game simulating the war table missions that highlighted the expansive reach and growing influence of the Inquisitor’s forces.
